title: Reset Password
content: Users can reset their password by navigating to Settings > Security > Reset Password. Enter your registered email and follow the link sent to reset your credentials.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are allowed within 7 days of purchase. To request a refund, go to My Orders, select the order, and click 'Request Refund'. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days.

title: Account Creation
content: To create an account, click 'Sign Up' on the homepage. Provide your name, email, and password. Verify your email via the confirmation link sent to your inbox.

title: Subscription Plans
content: We offer three plans: Basic (free), Pro ($9.99/month), and Enterprise ($49.99/month). Pro includes unlimited storage and priority support. Enterprise includes all Pro features plus dedicated account management.

title: Contact Support
content: You can reach our support team via email at support@example.com or through live chat available 9 AM to 6 PM IST, Monday to Saturday.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
content: 2FA can be enabled from Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication. We support authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy) and SMS-based OTP.

title: Cancel Subscription
content: To cancel your subscription, go to Settings > Billing > Cancel Plan. Your access continues until the end of the current billing cycle. No partial refunds are issued.

title: Data Export
content: Users can export all their data from Settings > Privacy > Export Data. A ZIP file containing your data will be emailed to your registered address within 24 hours.

title: Payment Methods
content: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, and UPI (India). All payments are secured with SSL encryption and PCI-DSS compliance.

title: Forgot Username
content: If you forgot your username, use the 'Forgot Username' link on the login page. Enter your registered email and your username will be sent to it.
